William Shakespeare

An English poet, playwright and actor

William Shakespeare was an English poet, playwright and actor, the greatest writer in the English language and the world's greatest dramatist.

Here's a time line of William Shakespeare's books published:

  • 1597 - Romeo and Juliet
  • 1598 - Love's Labours Lost
  • 1600 - A Midsummer Night's Dream
  • 1602 - The Merry Wives of Windsor
  • 1608 - King Lear
  • 1609 - The Sonnets
  • 1612 - Cardenio
  • 1622 - Othello
  • 1623 - The Two Gentlemen of Verona
  • 1634 - The Two Noble Kinsmen

In additional information about the author, here is the information of William Shakespeare.
